tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE algorithm_specific_rules (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rule_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    condition VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT unique_rule_name_condition UNIQUE(rule_name, condition)
)

CREATE TABLE Orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL,
    CONSTRAINT chk_total_amount CHECK (total_amount >= 0)
);

CREATE TABLE Products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL,
    stock_quantity INT,
    CONSTRAINT chk_stock_quantity CHECK (stock_quantity >= 0)
);

CREATE TABLE RuleParameters (
    parameter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rule_id INT REFERENCES AlgorithmRules(rule_id),
    parameter_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    parameter_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_rule_param FOREIGN KEY (rule_id) REFERENCES AlgorithmRules(rule_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE DataSamples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rule_id INT REFERENCES AlgorithmRules(rule_id),
    input_data TEXT NOT NULL,
    output_data TEXT NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_rule_data FOREIGN KEY (rule_id) REFERENCES AlgorithmRules(rule_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE Shipping (
    shipping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT NOT NULL,
    ship_date DATE NOT NULL,
    status ENUM('Shipped', 'In Transit', 'Delivered') DEFAULT 'In Transit',
    CONSTRAINT fk_order_id FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES Orders(order_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    age INT CHECK (age >= 18),
    created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW()
);

CREATE TABLE Comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT REFERENCES Posts(post_id),
    user_id INT REFERENCES Users(user_id),
    comment_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    comment_date DATE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE
);
